metadata.synopsis: If players interact both with LOW_BloodMerchant_Blackboard_000_4a542c37-0bca-447f-ac19-6843ac7f0101LOW_BloodMerchant_Blackboard_001_0859dcf8-4148-44cc-9360-a7352c6202c4, because Araj is not in the city, players will receive this.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Click on LOW_BloodMerchant_Blackboard_000_4a542c37-0bca-447f-ac19-6843ac7f0101LOW_BloodMerchant_Blackboard_001_0859dcf8-4148-44cc-9360-a7352c6202c4 under the following conditions:- Araj (S_MOO_InfernalVendor) was killed in Act 2 OR- No player gives her blood

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Due to the presence of prohibited substances and apparatus, this house has been reclaimed, by order of Archduke Enver Gortash.*
